attributes.action: not allow examples of animal cruelty to be posted on YouTube and for those carrying out the cruelty to be prosecuted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are endless examples of animal cruelty on YouTube.  There are no warnings attached to these clips so even children are able to view clips that adults find disturbing.  These clips could even act as encouragement for others to carry out similar acts of torture seeing as the number of clips have escalated since YouTube first started.  Protests are made to YouTube, but they do nothing.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
